NEXTAUTH_SECRET.description: Secret for NextAuth.js authentication. Generate using: openssl rand -base64 32 (Linux/Mac) or [Convert]::ToBase64String((1..32|%{Get-Random -Min 0 -Max 256})) (Windows PowerShell)

NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL.description: Production Convex deployment URL from: npx convex deploy

CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY.description: Optional: Convex deploy key for automated deployments (get from Convex dashboard)
